item.title: Why are you not on Twitter
item.description: <img src="/media/Twitter_Badge_1.png" alt="Image via Wikipedia" /> <figcaption> <p> Image via Wikipedia </p> </figcaption> Over the last 2 weeks I have found myself asking that question more times than I can remember. When I first heard about microblogging—or Twitter, the primary service that started the microblogging movement—over a year ago I thought it was a stupid fad and wouldn’t last. I mean what value can possibly be passed along in 140 characters or less.
